message.content: {"given_definition_quality":65,"better_definition":"Particle used to form a yes-no question.","sentence":"你好吗？","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animated style scene of two people in a gentle, dreamlike environment; one person is smiling and asking a question to another, with the Chinese text '你好吗？' visible in the foreground, muted colors, post-apocalyptic but peaceful mood.","sentence_translation":"How are you?"}
